subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: During No. 23 Davidson’s 68-65 victory over West Virginia in the Jimmy V Classic, it was evident that Stephen Curry is most effective as shooting guard, not point guard.
snippet: During No. 23 Davidson’s 68-65 victory over West Virginia in the Jimmy V Classic, it was evident that Stephen Curry is most effective as shooting guard, not point guard.
